author: Divya Rao
title: 5 Revelations Sidharth Malhotra And Jacqueline Fernandez Made About Their Sex Lives
text:
Divya Rao Jan . 9 . 2017 Jacqueline Fernandez, Sidharth Malhotra 
Okay, I have to say this – there’s a ridiculous amount of sexual tension between Sidharth Malhotra and Jacqueline Fernandez , as was evident on Koffee With Karan . The two cooked up a storm with their witty answers, chemistry, and good looks, much to Karan Johar ‘s approval! 
As part of a new segment on the show, Johar came up with Koffee Shots With Karan , wherein the two have to take a coffee shot every time they’ve done something he said. This entire round ended up being a bunch of sexual revelations! Here are five. 
1. They’ve part of the mile high club 
2. They’ve both had sex in the shower (not with each other) LOL 
3. They’ve had phone sex 
4. Jacqueline’s been in handcuffs 
5. Jacqueline sleeps naked (while Sidharth happily smirked) 
LOL. This was a firecracker of an episode! 7
